title: Fatty aldehyde bisulfite adducts as a purification handle in ionizable lipid synthesis
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26233-26238
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05189K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Graham Atwood, Sona Purbiya, Cassandra Reid, Brandon Smith, Kuljit Kaur, Drew Wicks, Peter Gaudet, K. Cory MacLeod, Jean-Francois Vincent-Rocan
Rapid access to ALC-0315, a crucial component of the formulated Pfizer Covid vaccine, was obtained by employing solid adduct formation and filtration in place of chromatographic separation, allowing for a more scalable synthesis.
